ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: This candidate has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 10 years. Currently this candidate is employed as a Technology Analyst at PEPSICO FRITO-LAY. This candidate has extensive knowledge of Struts Web Application Framework, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, Spring Framework, JavaScript, Java Server Pages, Java, JDBC, Enterprise Java Beans, Web Services, XML, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, Hibernate, HTML, Java Servlets, UML/OMT, Oracle, ECLiPSe, AJAX, Rational ClearCase, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, JUnit, WebSphere MQ Portal, SOAP, DHTML, UNIX, SQL, Rational Rose, Oracle PL/SQL, Oracle 9i, Object Oriented Analysis/Design, JSTL, XSLT, IBM Hardware, Ant, VSS, TOAD, Rational ClearQuest, Oracle 8i, Oracle 10G, MVC, Java Messaging Service, IBM WebSphere, DB2, Cascading Style Sheets, CVS, Apache Subversion, jQuery, XSL, UDDI, SQLPlus, MySQL, Microsoft Visio, Liferay Portal, JavaServer Faces, Java RMI, Java Applets, JDK, IBM WebSphere Application Server, Data Access Object, Agile Methodology, API, Visual Basic for Applications, Teradata, TOAD MVC Architecture, Relational Database, Rapid Application Development RAD, PC Hardware, PATTERN, Oracle Toad, Oracle 11g, ORACLE QA, NetBean 3.0, MyEclipse, Microsoft SQL Server 2005, Log4j, Linux, Java Swing, Java AWT, FLEX, Class Diagrams, CVS RTC, Ant Script. So far this candidate has not gained any managerial experience.
